title.abbrev: Addition of Kerberos Cipher Suites to TLS

front.title: Addition of Kerberos Cipher Suites to Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document proposes the addition of new cipher suites to the TLS protocolto support Kerberos-based authentication. Kerberos credentials are used to achieve mutual authentication and to establish a master secret which is subsequently used to secure client-server communication.
